channel.title: Ritasp on Nathan Strobl
channel.description: Recent content in Ritasp on Nathan Strobl

item.title: Project Overview
item.description: TL;DR This project was a collaborative effort with my colleagues aimed at streamlining some of the monotonous tasks we encounter while working as technicians for RIT Auxiliary Services Tech. While my coworkers focused on reverse engineering APIs for the various services we use and creating Python scripts to communicate with them, I concentrated on leveraging React to design a simple and effective UI, linking their Python scripts to this UI using Flask, and hosting the web application on my server.
